Author: hammerprice
Text: This was so raw and meaningful to read. I'm really sorry that this happened to you. It sounded like such a perfect escape. Food should be enjoyed and if you found that before then you can find it again. In the meantime, you're already stronger than you were in the past for knowing that your friend's behaviour is not right or healthy instead of buying into it. Hopefully he will listen to you. He just has a lot to unpack himself, too.

Author: roseprints
Text: I’m so sorry your safe space was violated. All too often, EDs are written off and it’s infuriating. It’s infuriating that he didn’t even try to empathize with you and help you resolve this. I hope this doesn’t set you back too harshly.
